about_the_game:
Tetram is a game that uses mechanics from the famous falling block game mixed with memorization and spatial location. This is a challenging game that will require all of your attention because with the slightest carelessness, you will lose the match.

During the game, your goal will be to fit the blocks to make lines, eliminating them. When all the blocks on the board are eliminated, the game's difficulty increases, and a new game starts with a random arrangement of new blocks on the board.

In this game, you will never have identical matches because with each new attempt, you will be presented with a level design generated entirely randomly. Therefore, your fun will be unlimited.

This is a game with easy-to-learn mechanics but with strategically challenging obstacles to master.

Show that you are quick, have a good spatial sense, and know how to assemble blocks to achieve an increasingly higher score on the leaderboard and always maintain the record.
